pages.text: $(o)Bountiful adds Bounty Boards that you can either craft and set up, or find in many villages across the world. $(br2) Bounties are posted to the board regularly, and can cover everything from finding items, fighting monsters, and more.$(br2)You can be rewarded with Coins, as well as Crate Keys for opening locked chests around the world.

pages.title: Decrees
pages.text: $(o)Another reward you can get specifically from Bounty Boards are Decrees. Every Bounty Board has a built in Decree to start with, then you can add two more.$(br2)Decrees will change what kind of Bounties the board will post up. If you have a Fishing Decree, only Fishing bounties will show up.
